d:
This is part of a project of mine to archive all the works of the great Touhou doujinshi writer-artist Azuki Osamitu. I have a thread about this project on the forums (https://forums.e-hentai.org/index.php?showtopic=292035 ), and I'm asking for all the help I can get.

You can buy "The Gap Where The Devil Lives" yourself here: https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=283376
n: [Non-H] [Azukigayu (Azuki Osamitu)] Akuma no Sumu Sukima (Touhou Project) [Digital]
